Instance.description: Situation for special NPC visit during a holiday.

TunableList.name: can_start_walkby_limiting_tags
TunableList.description:
Don't start a situation of this type if another situation is already running that has any of these tags in its tags field.
For instance, if you only want one Streaker at a time you would create a new tag SITUATION_STREAKER. Then set that in both this field and in the tags field of situation_streaker.

TunableTuple.name: arrival_state
TunableTuple.description: The state for pushing the NPC onto the lot.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: hang_out_state
TunableTuple.description: State where they hang out using role autonomy (if we want them to eat cookies). The interaction of interest should be them leaving at the fireplace.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: leave_state
TunableTuple.description: The state for pushing the NPC to leave.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: push_interaction_state
TunableTuple.description: The state for pushing the NPC to do an interaction on one of the primary targets

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

Tunable.name: interaction_to_push
Tunable.description: Interaction to push on a random target that was specified by the target filter method.

Tunable.name: iterations
Tunable.description: Number of times we want to push the interaction one after the other.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

Tunable.name: situation_job
Tunable.description: A reference to the SituationJob used for the Sim performing the holiday visitor situation.

TunableVariant.name: target_filter_tags
TunableVariant.description: Choose what kind of targets to grab. If turned on, use tags. Otherwise, use household sims.

TunableEnum.description: Define tags we want to filter by.
